msContents.summary: Missal, መጽሐፈ፡ ቅዳሴ፡, with musical notation. F-58r: Ordinary of the Mass. F-72r: Anaphora of the Apostles, Qǝddase Ḫawaryat, ቅዳሴ፡ ሐዋርያት፡. F-77r: Anaphora of Our Lord, ቅዳሴ፡ እግዚእ፡. F-88v: Anaphora of Our Lady Mary attributed to Cyriacus of Bəhənsa, Qǝddase Maryam Gwäs’a, ቅዳሴ፡ ማርያም፡. F-97v: Anaphora of John, Son of Thunder, Qǝddase Yoḥannəs Wäldä Nägwädǝgwad, ቅዳሴ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ ወልደ፡ ነጐድጓድ፡. F-100r: Anaphora of Dioscorus, Qǝddase Diosǝqoros, ቅዳሴ፡ ዲዮስቆሮስ፡. F-106v: Anaphora of Epiphanius, Qǝddase Epifanǝyos, ቅዳሴ፡ ኤጲፋንዮስ. F-115r: Anaphora of the 318 Orthodox Fathers, Qǝddase za-Śäläsǝtu, ቅዳሴ፡ ዘሠለስቱ፡ ምዕት፡. F-126r: Anaphora of Athanasius the Apostolic, Qǝddase Atǝnatewos, ቅዳሴ፡ አትናቴዎስ፡. F-134r: Anaphora of Basil of Caesarea, Qǝddase Baslǝyos, ቅዳሴ፡ ባስልዮስ፡. F-140v: Anaphora of Gregory, brother of Basil, Qǝddase Gorǝgorǝyos, ‘Ǝḫǝwä Baslǝyos., ቅዳሴ፡ ጎርጎርዮስ፡ እኅወ፡ ባስልዮስ፡. F-145v: Anaphora of John Chrysostom, Qǝddase Yoḥannəs Afä Wärq, ቅዳሴ፡ ዮሐንስ፡ አፈወርቅ፡. F-151v: Anaphora of Jacob of Serugh, Qǝddase Ya’ǝkob Zä-Śǝrug, ቅዳሴ፡ ያዕቆብ፡ ዘሥሩግ፡. F-158r: Anaphora of Cyril of Alexandria, Qǝddase Qerǝlos, ቅዳሴ፡ ቄርሎስ፡. F-161v: Anaphora of Gregory Nazanzia, ጎርጎርዮስ: ዘእንዚናዙ, here called Gregory the Armenian. -162r: Colophon: the book was written in the land of Sidamo (ሲዳሞ), in the town of ሀገረ ሰላም. Finished at 3 in the afternoon, on Saturday, in the month of Tahsas, in the year 1918, in the 20th night and the 17th day, in the year of Mark the Evangelist, in the reign of Askala Maryam (Zewditu) and Patriarch Matewos, the scribe, "sinful" ወልደ ፋሲለደስ, son of ገብረ ማርያም. The book was bought for 60 birr by three people, ወልደ ማርያም (who gave 10 birr), ወለተ ጊዮርጊስ (who gave 20 birr), and ወለተ ማርያም (who gave 30 birr) and gave it to Mihur Gedam in 1921 EC, in the time of Matewos and our queen Askala Maryam and our King Haile Selassie.

origin.origDate: F. 161v gives the date 1918 EC = 1925/6. F. 8r and passim mentions Menelik. F. 36v mentions Abba Qerelos and Patriarch Matewos.
